alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 3:40PM CDT until November 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL PUSHMATAHA AND LATIMER COUNTIES... At 339 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Yanush, moving northeast at 45 mph. Another severe thunderstorm was near Wilburton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Clayton... Higgins... Damon... Bengal... Yanush... Robbers Cave State Park... Gowen... Sardis... Panola... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
